name: Make-A-Friend
description:
"You really should make a friend, you know."

Meet Nathan, a lonesome middle-schooler who's been given a seven-step ritual guaranteed to make friends. If the man in the cream suit is to be believed, it only takes some clay, some candles, and a small mammal. The only catch: he has to find those things in his own room.

  • Collect the ritual ingredients throughout the room. You may have to make a substitution here or there.
  • Perform the steps within the interactive desk interface.
  • Decide the fate of this house. There are seven steps, but there is only one choice...

...will you make a friend?

[ Play time: 15-20 minutes ] [ There are no saves ]
